Posts.EditableText:
An end script script would be useful when using for eachs-it would basically end the script.

What about this? Is this planned?
Posts.HTML:
An end script script would be useful when using for eachs-it would basically end the script.

What about this? Is this planned?

Posts.EditableText: I believe this is "on the todo list", though I don't know what priority it is. I have heard mention of it before. (If you're used to other languages, you might know it better as a "break" statement.) Here is one logged issue. Perhaps you can vote for it and/or add a personal comment! http://quest.codeplex.com/workitem/1254 Here's another (which is slated for Quest 5.5): http://quest.codeplex.com/workitem/1060
